pair.rumours: Story 1: The shooting of two policemen in Montrouge is not connected to the Charlie Hebdo attack; Story 2: The gunmen confronted/had a shoot-out with police outside Charlie Hebdo
pair.t: Two police officers have been injured in a shooting in Montrouge in southern Paris - there is no direct link with the CharlieHebdo attack
pair.h: Armed gunmen face police officers near the offices of the satirical newspaper CharlieHebdo Photo: Anne Gelbard AFP URL
